description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国人，孔子最得意的弟子，位列孔门十哲和七十二贤之首，后世尊称为“复圣”。
description.en: A native of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, he was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism and the Seventy-two Disciples. He is posthumously honored as the 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国思想家、教育家，儒家学派创始人。
description.en: A philosopher and educator from the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 颜回的父亲。
description.en: Father of Yan Hui.

description.zh-cn: 颜回的儿子。
description.en: Son of Yan Hui.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期位于今山东省的一个重要诸侯国。
description.en: A major vassal state during the Zhou dynasty of ancient China, located in modern-day Shandong province.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省济宁市下辖的市辖区，古代为鲁国属地。
description.en: A district of Jining, Shandong, China. It was part of the State of Lu in ancient times.

description.zh-cn: 孔子门下在德行、言语、政事、文学四方面最杰出的十位弟子的合称。
description.en: A collective term for the ten most outstanding disciples of Confucius in the four areas of virtuous conduct, speech, governance, and literature.

description.zh-cn: 孔子门下最贤能的七十二位弟子的合称。
description.en: A collective term for the seventy-two most virtuous and capable disciples of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的儿子。
description.en: Son of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国君主。
description.en: The Duke of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第七位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝第八位皇帝。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝。
description.en: The twelfth emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 孔子弟子，儒家主要代表人物之一。
description.en: A disciple of Confucius and one of the main representatives of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是孔子最得意的弟子，位居孔门七十二贤之首。
description.en: Yan Hui was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Seventy-two Disciples.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是颜无繇的儿子。
description.en: Yan Hui is the son of Yan Wuyou.

description.zh-cn: 颜歆是颜回的儿子。
description.en: Yan Xin is the son of Yan Hui.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是鲁国人。
description.en: Yan Hui was a native of the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 颜回出生于鲁国兖州。
description.en: Yan Hui was born in Yanzhou, State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 颜回位列孔门十哲，属德行科。
description.en: Yan Hui was listed among the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism, in the category of virtuous conduct.

description.zh-cn: 颜回被列为七十二贤之首。
description.en: Yan Hui was ranked first among the Seventy-two Disciples.

description.zh-cn: 颜回与子路同为孔子弟子，曾一同侍奉孔子。
description.en: Yan Hui and Zilu were fellow disciples of Confucius and once served him together.

description.zh-cn: 孔鲤是孔子的儿子。
description.en: Kong Li was the son of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公曾向孔子询问其弟子中谁最好学，孔子回答是颜回。
description.en: Duke Ai of Lu once asked Confucius which of his disciples was the most eager to learn, and Confucius replied that it was Yan Hui.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗于贞观二年（628年）下诏尊称颜回为“先师”，提升了其历史地位。
description.en: In 628 (the 2nd year of the Zhenguan era), Emperor Taizong of Tang issued an edict honoring Yan Hui as 'Former Master', elevating his historical status.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗于总章元年（668年）追封颜回为太子少保。
description.en: In 668 (the 1st year of the Zongzhang era), Emperor Gaozong of Tang posthumously enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Junior Guardian of the Heir Apparent'.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗于开元二十七年（739年）封颜回为“兖公”。
description.en: In 739 (the 27th year of the Kaiyuan era), Emperor Xuanzong of Tang enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of Yan'.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗于大中祥符二年（1009年）加封颜回为“兖国公”。
description.en: In 1009 (the 2nd year of the Dazhong Xiangfu era), Emperor Zhenzong of Song further enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of the State of Yan'.

description.zh-cn: 元文宗于至顺元年（1330年）加封颜回为“兖国复圣公”。
description.en: In 1330 (the 1st year of the Zhishun era), Emperor Wenzong of Yuan further enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of the State of Yan, the Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗于嘉靖九年（1530年）改封颜回为“复圣”。
description.en: In 1530 (the 9th year of the Jiajing era), the Jiajing Emperor changed Yan Hui's title to 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 子贡是孔子的弟子。
description.en: Zigong was a disciple of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 子贡与颜回同为孔子弟子。子贡曾在孔子面前表示自己不敢与颜回相比。
description.en: Zigong and Yan Hui were fellow disciples of Confucius. Zigong once expressed to Confucius that he dared not compare himself to Yan Hui.

description.zh-cn: 曾子称颜回为自己的朋友，并赞扬其谦虚、不计较的品德。
description.en: Zengzi referred to Yan Hui as his friend and praised his virtues of modesty and magnanimity.
